| **[Reference](/wiki/Source_code "Source code")**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     | [EvilHack - monst.c, line 918](https://github.com/k21971/EvilHack/blob/master/src/monst.c#L918) |

A **goblin-captain**, o, is a type of [monster](/wiki/Monster "Monster") that appears in [EvilHack](/wiki/EvilHack "EvilHack") and [Hack'EM](/wiki/Hack%27EM "Hack'EM"). It is the strongest type of [goblin](/wiki/Goblin "Goblin").

## Generation

A goblin-captain has a 1⁄3 chance of [being generated with](/wiki/Monster_starting_inventory "Monster starting inventory") each of the following: an [orcish cloak](/wiki/Orcish_cloak "Orcish cloak"), an [orcish scimitar](/wiki/Orcish_scimitar "Orcish scimitar"), an [orcish shield](/wiki/Orcish_shield "Orcish shield"), an [orcish morning star](/wiki/Orcish_morning_star "Orcish morning star"), [orcish chain mail](/wiki/Orcish_chain_mail "Orcish chain mail"), and a pair of [orcish boots](/wiki/Orcish_boots "Orcish boots").

Randomly generated goblin-captains will always appear [riding](/wiki/Riding "Riding") a [saddled](/wiki/Saddle "Saddle") [warg](/wiki/Warg "Warg").

## Encyclopedia entry

Now goblins are cruel, wicked, and bad-hearted. They make  
no beautiful things, but they make many clever ones. They  
can tunnel and mine as well as any but the most skilled  
dwarves, when they take the trouble, though they are usually  
untidy and dirty. Hammers, axes, swords, daggers, pickaxes,  
tongs, and also instruments of torture, they make very well,  
or get other people to make to their design, prisoners and  
slaves that have to work till they die for want of air and  
light.  
\[ The Hobbit, by J.R.R. Tolkien ]

- *This page is a **[stub](/wiki/Category:Stubs "Category:Stubs")**. Should you wish to do so, you can contribute by [**expanding this page**.](https://nethackwiki.com/index.php?title=Goblin-captain\&action=edit)*

html:
Goblin-captain

From NetHackWiki
Jump to navigation Jump to search
o goblin-captain (No tile)
Difficulty 8
Attacks Weapon 2d4, Weapon 2d4
o goblin-captain (No tile)
Difficulty 8
Attacks

Weapon 2d4, Weapon 2d4

Base level 5
Base experience 36
Speed 10
Base AC 10
Base MR 0
Alignment -5 (chaotic)
Frequency (by normal means) 1 (Very rare)
Genocidable Yes
Weight 800
Nutritional value 200
Size Medium
Resistances poison
Resistances conveyed None

A goblin-captain:

  • has a head, a couple of arms, and a torso.
  • is omnivorous.
  • can pick up weapons and food.
  • has infravision.
  • can be seen through infravision.
Reference EvilHack - monst.c, line 918

A goblin-captain, o, is a type of monster that appears in EvilHack and Hack'EM. It is the strongest type of goblin.

Generation

A goblin-captain has a 1⁄3 chance of being generated with each of the following: an orcish cloak, an orcish scimitar, an orcish shield, an orcish morning star, orcish chain mail, and a pair of orcish boots.

Randomly generated goblin-captains will always appear riding a saddled warg.

Encyclopedia entry

Now goblins are cruel, wicked, and bad-hearted. They make
no beautiful things, but they make many clever ones. They
can tunnel and mine as well as any but the most skilled
dwarves, when they take the trouble, though they are usually
untidy and dirty. Hammers, axes, swords, daggers, pickaxes,
tongs, and also instruments of torture, they make very well,
or get other people to make to their design, prisoners and
slaves that have to work till they die for want of air and
light.
[ The Hobbit, by J.R.R. Tolkien ]

This page is a stub. Should you wish to do so, you can contribute by expanding this page.

A '''goblin-captain''', {{white|o}}, is a type of [[monster]] that appears in [[EvilHack]] and [[Hack'EM]]. It is the strongest type of [[goblin]].

==Generation==
A goblin-captain has a {{frac|3}} chance of [[Monster starting inventory|being generated with]] each of the following: an [[orcish cloak]], an [[orcish scimitar]], an [[orcish shield]], an [[orcish morning star]], [[orcish chain mail]], and a pair of [[orcish boots]].

Randomly generated goblin-captains will always appear [[riding]] a [[saddle]]d [[warg]].
